publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3980 Stuart McMillan: Inverclyde Trio Receive Youth Football Awardâ€”That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution to youth football in Inverclyde of Jim McCallum, John Docherty and Maurie Oliver; notes that the hat trick of heroes have been honoured by Provost Michael McCormick at a recent reception celebrating their service to youth football in Inverclyde, and acknowledges that the trio has given almost 100 years of service to local football clubs, is continuing to contribute greatly to youth football at a local level and is an outstanding example of successful community involvement.

S3M-3980 Inverclyde Trio Receive Youth Football Award (lodged on 24 April 2009) Jamie McGrigor*, Stewart Maxwell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Patricia Ferguson*, Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3980 Inverclyde Trio Receive Youth Football Award (lodged on 24 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Angela Constance*
S3M-3980 Inverclyde Trio Receive Youth Football Award (lodged on 24 April 2009) Ross Finnie*
